title: SR 16 Widening: IGP to CR 2209
details: State Road 16 is being widened from two lanes to a four-lane divided road between International Golf Parkway and CR 2209. The project adds turn lanes, a new signalized intersection at CR 2209, sidewalks, drainage upgrades, and safer crossings. Expect more traffic during construction but better capacity and safer access long term.
schedule: County contracts for over $25M in improvements were approved in mid-2025. Construction is underway, with major work expected through late 2026–2027 depending on phasing and weather.
projectId: FDOT FPID 210447-5 – SR 16 PD&E (IGP to I-95) + SJC SR 16/IGP – CR 2209 Widening & Signals
